internship.description: I am currently working at Google and am a part of a wonderful team that has been working on Pixel phones.
I interned at Facebook from May'2016 to August'2016 and had the wonderful opportunity to work on the news-feed.
I interned at Microsoft from May'2015 to August'2015 and was actively working on the azure team.
